name: @2dfire/2dfire-scripts
description: A test framework for front-end projects
author: yhtml5

scripts.document: cp -rf ../yhtml5-test/README.md ../yhtml5-test/doc . && git add . && npm run git 'update: test document'
scripts.postgit: git merge origin/master && git pull && git push && git status
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run document && npm version patch
